content: Yes, Everlane has a good selection of sustainable and affordable men's clothing, including t-shirts, shirts, sweaters, jackets, pants, and shoes. They are known for their minimalistic aesthetic, with a focus on timeless, classic designs that are made to last. Everlane also provides detailed information on how each item is made and the materials used, so you can make an informed decision about your purchase. They are committed to transparency and ethical production practices, so you can feel good about supporting their brand.
